about_the_game:
Relicborn is a story-driven platformer game that tells the story of Alice, a young dressmaker who finds herself learning physical combat in an undiscovered world, searching for a distant, long lost possibility. The game features ARPG elements, fantasy environments, legendary loot, a skill system and level up mechanics along with many secrets and easter eggs to be discovered. Comes with a unique set of original soundtracks!



You control Alice as she tangles herself up in a mysterious world trying to understand why she ended up there and what's the big secret yet to be uncovered. Help Alice make her decisions in conversations, change parts of the gameplay, unlock secrets and different paths in multiple playthroughs!



While the Environment in Relicborn's story mode is hand-crafted, you can also crawl through procedurally generated Endless Mode to test your skills, amass loot in your arsenal and increase your power for all modes!

Story:
Alice was a curious, yet a bit moody girl at her 22, trying to make a living by selling wool clothing in a little hut all by herself. She was moody because when she was a little kid,  at a frightful and unforgettable moment, her father has disappeared into nothingness right in front of her in a glimpse of an eye. Leaving her alone against the world. She could only grab a tiny slice of his dark red shirt and held onto it since. Cried a lot that night and the tears never left her eyes still. She made a locket and hidden the part of her father's shirt inside.

Nightmares and sorrow were with her constantly but she somehow survived doing what she can do best. Crafting clothes and selling them to passing merchants. since last year she's often been haunted by more intense nightmares of fighting with herself during her sleep. Lately, she had so much of these, she became afraid of sleeping.

Just when she had enough and were crying in her bed not knowing how to defeat these horrors, she noticed a glowing little ball figure out her window near her hut. Curiously, she tried to go near it and understand what it is. Just at the moment she raised her hand to reach the glowing figure, she glimpsed at her 'ghost' self standing afar! Seconds later, she fainted.

When she woke up, she was in a place unbeknownst to her and apparently, some haunting events occur out of nowhere...
